page.title: 20Credits ;the Hurn block.
page.content: Class 2,Holbeach Bank School who did all the donkey work. Katie Leak,Kelly Markillie,Ladonnya Pearson,Dawn Bunn,Sacha Howard,John Yeo,Marcus Hilliam,Matthew Blyth, Karl O'Neill,Jennifer Christensen,Michelle Harrison,Stephanie Fulcher,Philip Ingle,Paul Gregory,Luke Whitehead, Louise Markillie,Tracey Gray,Katie Hyde,Samantha Adams,Shelley Markham, Sarah-Jane Ingham.All aged 6-9 yrs. Farmers who allowed visits and gave information,people who helped with transport:-A.H.Worth Co-operative, Peter Shepherd,Fred Birkett, Michael Thompson,Tom Bradshaw,John Hardy and David Jenkinson. "A brief history of Holbeach Hurn" written in 1977 by the then vicars wife Edith Barrett. The teacher who checked and corrected it all,Mrs.Lesley Christensen.
